function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate cleaning of environmental surfaces in healthcare facilities","Impact":"Increase the risk of cross-contamination and transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Use of effective cleaning and disinfection protocols, regular monitoring of cleanliness, and training of cleaning staff","Technologies":"High-level disinfectants, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation, and automated room decontamination systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility management and infection control team"},{"Description":"Environmental contamination with SARS-CoV-2 in patient rooms and facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission to healthcare workers and other patients","Mitigation":"Regular and thorough environmental cleaning, use of personal protective equipment, and isolation protocols","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, air filtration systems, and antimicrobial surfaces","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility management and infection control team"},{"Description":"Viral shedding in stool as a potential route of transmission for SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased risk of fecal-oral transmission and environmental contamination in shared facilities","Mitigation":"Enhanced sanitation of toilet facilities, proper waste disposal, and promotion of hand hygiene","Technologies":"Improved sewage treatment systems, antimicrobial coatings for toilet surfaces, and odor control systems","People":"Patients, facility maintenance staff, visitors","Owner":"Facility management and infection control team"}]}
